game_description: Game Rules Try not to fall off the path. Make the hero jump while moving forward. There are enemies standing in the way, but the hero is very strong, so there is no problem even if you hit them. Defeat the dragon at the top to clear the game! Operation explanation Right hand side Oculus Touch A button (Decision, Jump) Left hand side Oculus Touch stick (left/right) (change perspective mode) Game Play Time About 5 minutes
Languages: English, English (US), English (Australia), English (Canada), English (South Africa), English (UK), Japanese
